DOC.brief_summary: This study will evaluate the efficacy of Once-daily Formoterol/Budesonide Turbuhaler 4.5/160 µg in the period of step down in well controlled asthmatic patient.
DOC.brief_title: Efficacy of Once-daily Formoterol/Budesonide Turbuhaler 4.5/160 µg in Step Down Asthma
DOC.detailed_description: The study will measure the efficacy of once daily low dose ICS/ LABA in well controlled asthmatic patient comparing with low dose ICS in step down circumstance.
DOC.criteria: Asthmatic patients who have well controlled asthma at least 12 weeks with using formoterol/budesonide (4.5/160) twice daily Age more than 18 yearold Patients who able to do spirometry without contraindication History smoking less than 10 packyears History of using systemic steroid previous 4 week and respiratory infection History of pulmonary tuberculosis with residual lung lesion by chest radiograph recent serious medical condition such as myocardial infarction, stroke, pneumonia etc.
